title: VPN Connection Fails When Working Remotely
content: Check VPN credentials, verify internet connection, and ensure VPN client certificates are valid.

title: Outlook Performance Issues
content: Disable unnecessary add-ins, clear cache, and recreate the Outlook profile if needed.

title: Network Printer Jobs Stuck in Queue
content: Restart the Print Spooler service and remove pending print jobs.

title: SAP Freezes During Report Execution
content: Check available system memory, close unused SAP sessions, and verify SAP GUI version compatibility.

title: Access Denied to Shared Network Folder
content: Verify user group membership and NTFS permissions on the shared folder.

title: Computer Does Not Power On
content: Ensure power cable is connected, test with another power outlet, and check power supply indicators.

title: Webcam Not Detected in Microsoft Teams
content: Confirm camera permissions in Teams and update webcam drivers.

title: Unable to Log In With Domain Account
content: Verify domain connectivity, system time synchronization, and account status in Active Directory.

title: Troubleshooting Windows Blue Screen Errors
content: Review recent driver changes, analyze minidump files, and apply system updates.

title: Slow Internet Connection in Office
content: Check network utilization, restart network equipment, and run a speed test.

title: Windows Updates Stuck or Not Installing
content: Reset Windows Update components and restart the update service.

title: Wi-Fi Network Not Visible on Laptop
content: Enable wireless adapter, reinstall Wi-Fi drivers, and disable airplane mode.

title: SAP License Error on Login
content: Verify license server availability and ensure the correct license is assigned to the user.

title: Emails Not Sending From Outlook
content: Check SMTP settings, disable offline mode, and test mailbox connectivity.

title: Microphone Not Working During Calls
content: Select the correct input device and allow microphone access in system settings.

title: System Drive C Is Out of Disk Space
content: Run Disk Cleanup, delete temporary files, and move large files to another drive.

title: Corporate Portal Is Not Accessible
content: Verify internal DNS resolution and check access from the corporate network.

title: OneDrive Files Not Syncing
content: Restart the OneDrive client and confirm user authentication status.

title: Printer Printing Blank Pages
content: Reinstall printer drivers and verify toner cartridge installation.

title: Keyboard Not Responding Properly
content: Reconnect the keyboard and update or reinstall keyboard drivers.

title: Google Chrome Freezes or Becomes Unresponsive
content: Clear browser cache, disable extensions, and update Chrome to the latest version.

title: How to Set Up Email Auto-Reply
content: Instructions for configuring out-of-office replies in Outlook.

title: Requesting Access to New Systems
content: Steps to submit an access request through the IT service portal.

title: Using Multi-Factor Authentication
content: Guide on how to approve login requests using MFA.

title: Corporate Password Policy Overview
content: Explanation of password complexity and rotation requirements.

title: How to Install Approved Software
content: Procedure for installing applications from the company software catalog.

title: Booking Meeting Rooms in Outlook
content: Steps to reserve meeting rooms using the Outlook calendar.

title: Information Security Best Practices
content: Recommendations for identifying phishing emails and securing accounts.

title: Remote Work Guidelines
content: Rules and recommendations for working remotely.

title: How to Update Personal Profile Information
content: Instructions for updating user profile details in corporate systems.
